original_text: “This is what the Lord Almighty says: ‘If you will walk in obedience to me and keep my requirements, then you will govern my house and have charge of my courts, and I will give you a place among these standing here.
korean_text: 만군의 여호와의 말씀에 네가 만일 내 도를 행하며 내 규례를 지키면 네가 내 집을 다스릴 것이요 내 뜰을 지킬 것이며 내가 또 너로 여기 섰는 자들 가운데에 왕래하게 하리라

sentences.original_text: This is what the Lord Almighty says
If you will walk in obedience to me
then you will govern my house
sentences.korean_translation: 그리하면 너는 내 집을 다스릴 것이요

sentences.original_text: and have charge of my courts
and I will give you a place
